articles.title: Health experts say Omicron is headed for a sharp drop, most Americans will get infected, everyone's confused - Yahoo News

articles.content:
Dr. Janet Woodcock Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images 
There's good news about this Omicron phase of the COVID-19 pandemic, and bad news, but much of it is based on educated guesses and the good and bad … [+2512 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Face shields, plexiglass barriers 'a waste of money' in Covid-19 battle: US aerosol expert - The Star Online
articles.description: MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/Asia News Network): Instead of face shields and plexiglass barriers, the Philippines should rely more on protective masks and proper ventilation, and even going outdoors, an American aerosol expert said.
